post:
Hello!

We are proud to announce the launch of our brand new **RAID 10** SSD KVM Virtual Servers. We have put together an offer for the lovely folks on LEB & LET (hopefully this should be appearing on LEB soon).

All of our Florida SSD VPSs are running: 

- 4x 512GB SSDs (100k IOPs)
- RAID 10 Storage with BBU.
- Intel E3-1230 or above CPU 
- Free Instant Setup with love! 
- Supermicro Servers 
- 24x7 Support 
- SolusVM 
- rDNS Capability
- 1Gbps Port

====================================

**LEB SSD VPS Package**

> - 512MB Ram
> - 15GB SSD Disk Space (Hardware RAID 10 w/BBU)
> - 1TB Bandwidth
> - 1 IPv4 Address
> - Access to 4 Cores

**Price: $7.00/mo**

**Order:** http://mylovevps.com/hostbill/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=259

====================================

**FAQ?**

- Do you have an ISO list? _Yes we do ([click here](http://mylovevps.com/hostbill/index.php?/knowledgebase/article/14/iso-list/)), anything not there just ask and we will add it for you._

- What sort of IO performance should I be expecting? _I know how much you guys love your DD tests:_ 

> dd if=/dev/zero of=sb-io-test bs=64k count=16k conv=fdatasync 16384+0 records in 16384+0 records out 1073741824 bytes (1.1 GB) copied, 0.922279 s, 1.2 GB/s
>
> (System: Ubuntu 12.04 - ext4 file system)

- How can I pay? _We currently only accept PayPal at the present time_.

- Are your servers instantly setup? _Yes they are_.

- Do you have 24/7 support? _Yes we provide 24/7 support via out support ticket system_.

- Do you have any test IPs & files? Yes we do they are located here: http://www.lovevps.com/locations/#contentFlorida-tab.

====================================

**Moving From a competitor? Send us an email and get 15% off your first invoice!**

Any questions be sure to email me on matthew@lovevps.com or grab me on Skype: LoveVPS.

If you require a quote for any services please drop us an email and we will do our best to help.
